dcterms:description: The i2b2 2010/VA challenge dataset provides assertion annotations only for concepts of type 'problem'. It includes named entities such as problems, treatments, and tests, along with polarity and modality information for all identified entity spans.
dcterms:title: i2b2 2010/VA

dcterms:creator: W. Sun
A. Rumshisky
O. Uzuner
dcterms:description: The i2b2 2012 dataset includes named entities, polarity, and modality annotations. It consists of discharge summaries with various clinical events and their attributes annotated by multiple human annotators.
dcterms:title: i2b2 2012
